SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.io

Class Zip

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.io.Zip
All Implemented Interfaces:
Flushable, AutoCloseable
public final class Zip extends Object implements AutoCloseable, Flushable
A Class helping with the creation of zip files. This class is mainly for creating zip data on the fly. For zipping the contents of a directory, use IoUtil.zip(Path, Path) instead.

  • Constructor Details

    • Zip

      public Zip(OutputStream out)
      Create a new Zip instance.
      Parameters:
      out - the OutputStream to write the zip data to

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(String filename, byte[] data) throws IOException
      Add file to zip.

      The file will be placed under the last created directory.

      Parameters:
      filename - the filename
      data - the data
      Throws:
      IOException - on error

    • add

      public void add(String filename, String data) throws IOException
      Add non-binary (text) file to zip.

      text will be written as UTF-8 encoded data and the file will be placed under the last created directory.

      Parameters:
      filename - the filename
      data - the data
      Throws:
      IOException - on error

    • add

      public void add(String filename, InputStream in) throws IOException
      Add file to zip.

      The file will be placed under the last created directory.

      Parameters:
      filename - the filename
      in - the InputStream to read the data from
      Throws:
      IOException - on error

    • directory

      public void directory(String dirname) throws IOException
      Add directory to zip.

      The directory will be placed under the last created directory unless it starts with '/' (denotes the zip's root).

      Parameters:
      dirname - the directory name
      Throws:
      IOException - on error
